description: OECS Disaster Response and Risk Reduction

subproject.description:
This programme is designed to provide support to the countries of the Organisation of Eastern Caribbean States' Sub-region in strengthening their capacities and efforts to undertake Macro-Economic and Social Assessments of the effects of disasters on the performance of their economies.  It will also assist the countries to reduce the risks posed by these natural disasters in a manner that is sustainable through three thematic areas, namely settlement planning and development,  safe construction and economic resilience.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Output 1: 3 Community demonstration projects complete including training of local persons, completion of remedial works, and documentation of practice
Output 2:  Develop critical capacity in two OECS countries to support post disaster recovery and reconstruction
Output 3: Increase community resilience to natural hazards
Output 4:  Strengthen development planing processes and mechanisms
Output 5:  Enhance capacity fo rpost-disaster macro socio-economic impact assessments
subproject.title: Disaster Response & Reduction
